column1: #Text=The captured soldiers have attempted to break out of prison.
#Text=Orsini bombs have been discovered in the city.
#Text=Families are flying to the Piraeus in order to take refuge on shipboard in case of need.
#Text=English and French ships of war have left for Nauplia to afford an asylum for fugitives.
#Text=Heavy firing continues against the royal camp.
#Text=Fresh disturbances have broke out in Syra, for which island the steamer Amalia has left with troops.
#Text=A band of Albanian Turks have crossed the frontier at Lomia, and have penetrated to Orano.
#Text=The Government has despatched troops thither, and has forwarded notes to the Turkish Government and the three protecting Pawers.
#Text=The King of Greece and the Court are preparing for tha worst and are expected ere long to quit for Bavaria.
#Text=None of the protecting Powers will help them.
